price: ខោអាវរបស់ពួកគេធ្វើអំពីជ័រ ហើយភ្លើងនរកនឹងគ្រប ដណ្ដប់លើមុខរបស់ពួកគេ។
arabic: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٖ وَتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumu al-nāru
